content: Well, I met him when I was about 6 years old, but don't remember him at all. I met him this past Tuesday. My dad is originally from Latrobe and I think we have been up there a few times when I was growing up. David, my cousin lives in Albq., NM. He is an Army Vet and retired fireman. Sure was great meeting him. Oh, and we have the same kind of personnalty, crazy......

content: My dad brought up going to Latrobe when David was here. Dads girlfriend doesn't want to go, can't blame her, lol. Dennis told my dad to take me. I said I'll go to Italy with ya. Dad, me and my ex went to Latrobe in 99 after mom died. But David wasn't there. He has 6 brothers and sisters. His parents are deceaed, dad is the only one left. Dad will be 88 Sept. 3rd. Dad said he didn't know if he could stand to be around me for so long, lol, we are alike...

content: Latrobe is in PA., about 15 miles or so from where Flight 93 crashed. Dad and my step mom went up there, really sad. Dad buried two wives and he is the last one living. He is so happy to have David in his life. And yea, we fuss, but we don't argue. I am the only daughter. When dad tells you a story, he takes so long, lol. He was like that as long as I have known him. He has gotten worse too, lol.
